name: A bonus for you and your friends
shortDescription:
Love Mintos? Invite a friend, and for a limited time you’ll both earn a bonus on top of your usual returns. You’ll get €50 for each friend who invests €1 000 or more.

Your friend will get

  • €50 bonus for investing €1 000 or more
  • And 1% bonus of the average investment in the first 90 days


To get the bonus, your friend needs to register and invest €1 000 or more.

€ 50 is paid 90 days after registration if your friend or family member invests at least € 1000 within 60 days of registration and maintains a minimum investment of € 1000 continuously until the 90th day after registration.

name: Earn up to 6% cashback with Nera Capital loans
shortDescription:
For a limited time, you can earn 6% cashback for investing €200 or more in Notes for Nera Capital with 14% interest rate, and 5% cashback for Notes with 15% interest rate.
 
This offer is valid for a limited time, from 22 February to 21 March 2025.

To receive a cashback bonus, you must enroll in the campaign before you invest. This applies even if you’ve enrolled in the previous campaign.

name: Earn 1% cashback with Finprospera loans
shortDescription:
For a limited time, you can earn 1% cashback for investing €50 or more in Notes for Finprospera with a 12% interest rate.
 
This offer is valid for a limited time, from 20 February 2025 to 13 March 2025.

To receive a cashback bonus, you must enroll in the campaign before you invest.
